text: The North West Province, also known as North Western Province, is one of the five administrative regions of Sierra Leone. The province has 34 chiefdoms and 1,162,065 people lived here in 2017. The capital is Port Loko. == History == The province was created in 2017 as a split from the Northern Province. == Districts == The province has three districts: * Kambia District * Karene District * Port Loko District Category:2017 establishments in Africa Category:Provinces of Sierra Leone
title: North West Province, Sierra Leone
